vsParam:
Darn it! The scenes in front my eyes changed all of a sudden,
and I am surrounded by things I've never seen or heard of!
Where the heck is this place!?
W, we have told you, this is the Academy of Bressisle Kingdom...

I've heard of it for 100 times!
I just want to know——

A, anyway... Please calm down!
We are bewildered too.

... Alright then. We don't know each other yet,
it's impossible for us to have a normal communication.
My name is Mimi Houllier von Schwarzlang.

I am an "adventurer" in a place called "Arland"
and my goal is to spread the name of Schwarzlang family.
This is a different world, it's understandable that you don't know.
Anyway, let just leave these petty things aside.

There's no use to discuss about it,
it's just a waste of time.

Hmm, a relevant evaluation.
Yeah, I am always this cool!

I've decided. I'll spread the name of Schwarzlang family
throughout this world! With the fastest speed!

Oh. Is the name of "Schwarzlang family"
really so important?

What are you talking about? It's needless to ask.
The noble aristocratic family can't be unknown to the public.

You, your name is [px], right? Although you look like
someone I know who also has a goofy face...

Just come to me if you run into any trouble.
I'll help you settle it right away.

Thank you!
You are so kind, Mimi!

D, don't get me wrong!
I am doing this for myself only!

I didn't mean to help you!
Yeah, it's not my intention!

O, okay, I see. Although I have no idea what you are
trying to say... Nice to meet you, Mimi!
